name: PatternOptionBuilder_parsePatternTest
description: Unit tests for the parsePattern method in PatternOptionBuilder class.

test_cases.name: testParsePattern_SingleOption
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of a single option without arguments.

test_cases.name: testParsePattern_OptionWithValueCode
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of an option with a value code.

test_cases.name: testParsePattern_OptionWithRequiredFlag
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of an option with a required flag.

test_cases.name: testParsePattern_MultipleOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of multiple options with different configurations.
